trans-unit.source: Use R in HDInsight to customize clusters | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Use R in HDInsight to customize clusters | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to install and use R to customize Hadoop clusters.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to install and use R to customize Hadoop clusters.

trans-unit.source: You can install R on any type of cluster in Hadoop on HDInsight by using Script Action cluster customization.
trans-unit.target: You can install R on any type of cluster in Hadoop on HDInsight by using Script Action cluster customization.

trans-unit.source: This enables data scientists and analysts to use R to deploy the powerful MapReduce/YARN programming framework to process large amounts of data on Hadoop clusters that are deployed in HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: This enables data scientists and analysts to use R to deploy the powerful MapReduce/YARN programming framework to process large amounts of data on Hadoop clusters that are deployed in HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: The steps in this document require a Linux-based HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: The steps in this document require a Linux-based HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: For information on using R with a Windows-based cluster, see <linkText>Install and use R on HDinsight Hadoop clusters (Windows)</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: For information on using R with a Windows-based cluster, see <linkText>Install and use R on HDinsight Hadoop clusters (Windows)</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: The R Project for Statistical Computing is an open source language and environment for statistical computing.
trans-unit.target: The R Project for Statistical Computing is an open source language and environment for statistical computing.

trans-unit.source: R provides hundreds of build-in statistical functions and its own programming language that combines aspects of functional and object-oriented programming.
trans-unit.target: R provides hundreds of build-in statistical functions and its own programming language that combines aspects of functional and object-oriented programming.

trans-unit.source: It also provides extensive graphical capabilities.
trans-unit.target: It also provides extensive graphical capabilities.

trans-unit.source: R is the preferred programming environment for most professional statisticians and scientists in a wide variety of fields.
trans-unit.target: R is the preferred programming environment for most professional statisticians and scientists in a wide variety of fields.

trans-unit.source: R scripts can be run on Hadoop clusters in HDInsight that were customized using Script Action when created to install the R environment.
trans-unit.target: R scripts can be run on Hadoop clusters in HDInsight that were customized using Script Action when created to install the R environment.

trans-unit.source: R is compatible with Azure Blob Storage (WASB) so that data that is stored there can be processed using R on HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: R is compatible with Azure Blob Storage (WASB) so that data that is stored there can be processed using R on HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: The script action used to install R on your HDInsight cluster installs the following Ubuntu packages, which provide a basic R installation:
trans-unit.target: The script action used to install R on your HDInsight cluster installs the following Ubuntu packages, which provide a basic R installation:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>r-base</linkText><title></title>: Base GNU R package
trans-unit.target: <linkText>r-base</linkText><title></title>: Base GNU R package

trans-unit.source: <linkText>r-base-dev</linkText><title></title>: Auxilliary GNU R packages
trans-unit.target: <linkText>r-base-dev</linkText><title></title>: Auxilliary GNU R packages

trans-unit.source: The following RHadoop packages are also installed, which provide integration with MapReduce and HDFS:
trans-unit.target: The following RHadoop packages are also installed, which provide integration with MapReduce and HDFS:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>rmr2</linkText><title></title>: Allows R developers to use Hadoop MapReduce
trans-unit.target: <linkText>rmr2</linkText><title></title>: Allows R developers to use Hadoop MapReduce

trans-unit.source: <linkText>rhdfs</linkText><title></title>: Allows R developers to use Hadoop HDFS (WASB for HDInsight)
trans-unit.target: <linkText>rhdfs</linkText><title></title>: Allows R developers to use Hadoop HDFS (WASB for HDInsight)

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the following R packages are installed:
trans-unit.target: Additionally, the following R packages are installed:

trans-unit.source: R package
trans-unit.target: R package

trans-unit.source: What it provides
trans-unit.target: What it provides

trans-unit.source: <linkText>rJava</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>rJava</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: A low level R to Java interface.
trans-unit.target: A low level R to Java interface.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Rcpp</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Rcpp</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: R and C++ integration.
trans-unit.target: R and C++ integration.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>RJSONIO</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>RJSONIO</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Serialize/deserialize R objects to JSON
trans-unit.target: Serialize/deserialize R objects to JSON

trans-unit.source: <linkText>bitops</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>bitops</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Functions for bitwise operations on integer vectors.
trans-unit.target: Functions for bitwise operations on integer vectors.

trans-unit.source: [digest](Create Cryptographic Hash Digests of R Objects)
trans-unit.target: [digest](Create Cryptographic Hash Digests of R Objects)

trans-unit.source: Create Cryptographic Hash Digests of R Objects.
trans-unit.target: Create Cryptographic Hash Digests of R Objects.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>functional</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>functional</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Curry, Compose, and other higher-order functions
trans-unit.target: Curry, Compose, and other higher-order functions

trans-unit.source: <linkText>reshape2</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>reshape2</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Flexibly restructure and aggregate data.
trans-unit.target: Flexibly restructure and aggregate data.

trans-unit.target: <linkText>stringr</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Simple, Consistent Wrappers for Common String Operations.
trans-unit.target: Simple, Consistent Wrappers for Common String Operations.

trans-unit.target: <linkText>plyr</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Tools for Splitting, Applying and Combining Data.
trans-unit.target: Tools for Splitting, Applying and Combining Data.

trans-unit.target: <linkText>caTools</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Tools for moving window statistics, GIF, Base64, ROC AUC, etc.
trans-unit.target: Tools for moving window statistics, GIF, Base64, ROC AUC, etc.

trans-unit.target: <linkText>stringdist</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Approximate String Matching and String Distance Functions.
trans-unit.target: Approximate String Matching and String Distance Functions.

trans-unit.source: The <linkText>https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/linuxrconfigactionv01/r-installer-v01.sh</linkText><title></title> script action is used to install R on an HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: The <linkText>https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/linuxrconfigactionv01/r-installer-v01.sh</linkText><title></title> script action is used to install R on an HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: This section provides instructions about how to use the script when provisioning the cluster using the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: This section provides instructions about how to use the script when provisioning the cluster using the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: You can also use Azure PowerShell or the HDInsight .NET SDK to create a cluster using this script.
trans-unit.target: You can also use Azure PowerShell or the HDInsight .NET SDK to create a cluster using this script.

trans-unit.source: For more information on using these methods, see <linkText>Customize HDInsight clusters with Script Actions</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For more information on using these methods, see <linkText>Customize HDInsight clusters with Script Actions</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Start provisioning a cluster by using the steps in <linkText>Provision Linux-based HDInsight clusters</linkText><title></title>, but do not complete provisioning.
trans-unit.target: Start provisioning a cluster by using the steps in <linkText>Provision Linux-based HDInsight clusters</linkText><title></title>, but do not complete provisioning.

trans-unit.source: On the Optional Configuration blade, select Script Actions, and provide the information below:
trans-unit.target: On the Optional Configuration blade, select Script Actions, and provide the information below:

trans-unit.source: NAME: Enter a friendly name for the script action.
trans-unit.target: NAME: Enter a friendly name for the script action.

trans-unit.source: SCRIPT URI: https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/linuxrconfigactionv01/r-installer-v01.sh
trans-unit.target: SCRIPT URI: https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/linuxrconfigactionv01/r-installer-v01.sh

trans-unit.source: HEAD: Check this option
trans-unit.target: HEAD: Check this option

trans-unit.source: WORKER: Check this option
trans-unit.target: WORKER: Check this option

trans-unit.source: ZOOKEEPER: Check this option to install on the Zookeeper node.
trans-unit.target: ZOOKEEPER: Check this option to install on the Zookeeper node.

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS: Leave this field blank
trans-unit.target: PARAMETERS: Leave this field blank

trans-unit.source: At the bottom of the Script Actions, use the Select button to save the configuration.
trans-unit.target: At the bottom of the Script Actions, use the Select button to save the configuration.

trans-unit.source: Finally, use the Select button at the bottom of the Optional Configuration blade to save the optional configuration information.
trans-unit.target: Finally, use the Select button at the bottom of the Optional Configuration blade to save the optional configuration information.

trans-unit.source: Continue provisining the cluster as described in <linkText>Provision Linux-based HDInsight clusters</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: Continue provisining the cluster as described in <linkText>Provision Linux-based HDInsight clusters</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: After the cluster has finished provisioning, use the following steps to use R to perform a MapReduce operation on the cluster.
trans-unit.target: After the cluster has finished provisioning, use the following steps to use R to perform a MapReduce operation on the cluster.

trans-unit.source: Connect to the HDInsight cluster using SSH:
trans-unit.target: Connect to the HDInsight cluster using SSH:

trans-unit.source: For more information on using SSH with HDInsight, see the following:
trans-unit.target: For more information on using SSH with HDInsight, see the following:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Use SSH with Linux-based Hadoop on HDInsight from Linux, Unix, or OS X</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Use SSH with Linux-based Hadoop on HDInsight from Linux, Unix, or OS X</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Use SSH with Linux-based Hadoop on HDInsight from Windows</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Use SSH with Linux-based Hadoop on HDInsight from Windows</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: From the username@headnode1:~$ prompt, enter the following command to start an interactive R session:
trans-unit.target: From the username@headnode1:~$ prompt, enter the following command to start an interactive R session:

trans-unit.source: Enter the following R program.
trans-unit.target: Enter the following R program.

trans-unit.source: This generates the numbers 1 to 100 and then multiplies them by 2.
trans-unit.target: This generates the numbers 1 to 100 and then multiplies them by 2.

trans-unit.source: The first line calls the RHadoop library rmr2, which is used for MapReduce operations.
trans-unit.target: The first line calls the RHadoop library rmr2, which is used for MapReduce operations.

trans-unit.source: The second line generates values 1 - 100, then stores them to the Hadoop file system using to.dfs.
trans-unit.target: The second line generates values 1 - 100, then stores them to the Hadoop file system using to.dfs.

trans-unit.source: The third line creates a MapReduce process using functionality provided by rmr2, and begins processing.
trans-unit.target: The third line creates a MapReduce process using functionality provided by rmr2, and begins processing.

trans-unit.source: You should see several lines scroll past as the processing begins.
trans-unit.target: You should see several lines scroll past as the processing begins.

trans-unit.source: Next, use the following to see the temporary path that the MapReduce output was stored to:
trans-unit.target: Next, use the following to see the temporary path that the MapReduce output was stored to:

trans-unit.source: This should be something similar to /tmp/file5f615d870ad2.
trans-unit.target: This should be something similar to /tmp/file5f615d870ad2.

trans-unit.source: To view the actual output, use the following:
trans-unit.target: To view the actual output, use the following:

trans-unit.source: The output should look like this:
trans-unit.target: The output should look like this:

trans-unit.source: To exit R, enter the following:
trans-unit.target: To exit R, enter the following:

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Install and use Hue on HDInsight clusters</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Install and use Hue on HDInsight clusters</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Hue is a web UI that makes it easy to create, run and save Pig and Hive jobs, as well as browse the default storage for your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Hue is a web UI that makes it easy to create, run and save Pig and Hive jobs, as well as browse the default storage for your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Install and use Spark on HDInsight clusters[hdinsight-install-spark]</linkText><title></title> for instructions about how to use cluster customization to install and use Spark on HDInsight Hadoop clusters.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Install and use Spark on HDInsight clusters[hdinsight-install-spark]</linkText><title></title> for instructions about how to use cluster customization to install and use Spark on HDInsight Hadoop clusters.

trans-unit.source: Spark is an open-source parallel processing framework that supports in-memory processing to boost the performance of big data analytic applications.
trans-unit.target: Spark is an open-source parallel processing framework that supports in-memory processing to boost the performance of big data analytic applications.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Install Giraph on HDInsight clusters</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Install Giraph on HDInsight clusters</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Use cluster customization to install Giraph on HDInsight Hadoop clusters.
trans-unit.target: Use cluster customization to install Giraph on HDInsight Hadoop clusters.

trans-unit.source: Giraph allows you to perform graph processing using Hadoop, and it can be used with Azure HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Giraph allows you to perform graph processing using Hadoop, and it can be used with Azure HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Install Solr on HDInsight clusters</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Install Solr on HDInsight clusters</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Use cluster customization to install Solr on HDInsight Hadoop clusters.
trans-unit.target: Use cluster customization to install Solr on HDInsight Hadoop clusters.

trans-unit.source: Solr allows you to perform powerful search operations on stored data.
trans-unit.target: Solr allows you to perform powerful search operations on stored data.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Install Hue on HDInsight clusters</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Install Hue on HDInsight clusters</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Use cluster customization to install Hue on HDInsight Hadoop clusters.
trans-unit.target: Use cluster customization to install Hue on HDInsight Hadoop clusters.

trans-unit.source: Hue is a set of Web applications used to interact with a Hadoop cluster.
trans-unit.target: Hue is a set of Web applications used to interact with a Hadoop cluster.
